content.p: You will learn to utilise the theoretical and practical techniques of finance and accounting within an economic, organisational and decision-making framework. You will also develop a critical understanding of the techniques and their contexts. The course aims to provide students with a strong theoretical foundation that is vital to the development of analysis and problem-solving skills. This is crucial to the needs of the accounting profession and careers in banking, finance and general management. Our strong relationships with professional accounting bodies allow our students on this course to obtain a professional qualification at an accelerated route as the course obtains an extensive range of exemptions from the following bodies: ACCA CIMA CPA Australia ICAEW Nottingham University Business School Malaysia The University of Nottingham Malaysia Jalan Broga, 43500 Semenyih, Selangor Darul Ehsan, Malaysia Jalan Broga, 43500 Semenyih Selangor Darul Ehsan Malaysia University of Nottingham Malaysia DULN001(B) telephone: +6 03 8924 8000 fax: +6 03 8924 8005 course enquiries: +6 03 8924 8686 Monday - Saturday 9:00am - 5:30pm (Except on public holidays)
